description: A set of virtualization specific properties from Common Information Model (CIM) schema (http://www.dmtf.org/standards/cim), which define the virtual aspects of a virtual system. These properties may be specified to host aggregate and flavor. For each property details, please refer to http://schemas.dmtf.org/wbem/cim-html/2/CIM_VirtualSystemSettingData.html.

AutomaticRecoveryAction.title: Automatic Recovery Action
AutomaticRecoveryAction.description: Action to take for the virtual system when the software executed by the virtual system fails.

AutomaticShutdownAction.title: Automatic Shutdown Action
AutomaticShutdownAction.description: Action to take for the virtual system when the host is shut down.

AutomaticStartupAction.title: Automatic Startup Action
AutomaticStartupAction.description: Action to take for the virtual system when the host is started.

AutomaticStartupActionSequenceNumber.title: Automatic Startup Action Sequence Number
AutomaticStartupActionSequenceNumber.description: Number indicating the relative sequence of virtual system activation when the host system is started.

ConfigurationDataRoot.title: Configuration Data Root
ConfigurationDataRoot.description: Filepath of a directory where information about the virtual system configuration is stored.

ConfigurationFile.title: Configuration File
ConfigurationFile.description: Filepath of a file where information about the virtual system configuration is stored.

ConfigurationID.title: Configuration ID
ConfigurationID.description: Unique id of the virtual system configuration.

CreationTime.title: Creation Time
CreationTime.description: Time when the virtual system configuration was created.

LogDataRoot.title: Log Data Root
LogDataRoot.description: Filepath of a directory where log information about the virtual system is stored.

RecoveryFile.title: Recovery File
RecoveryFile.description: Filepath of a file where recovery relateded information of the virtual system is stored.

SnapshotDataRoot.title: Snapshot Data Root
SnapshotDataRoot.description: Filepath of a directory where information about virtual system snapshots is stored.

SuspendDataRoot.title: Suspend Data Root
SuspendDataRoot.description: Filepath of a directory where suspend related information about the virtual system is stored.

SwapFileDataRoot.title: Swap File Data Root
SwapFileDataRoot.description: Filepath of a directory where swapfiles of the virtual system are stored.

VirtualSystemIdentifier.title: Virtual System Identifier
VirtualSystemIdentifier.description: VirtualSystemIdentifier shall reflect a unique name for the system as it is used within the virtualization platform.

VirtualSystemType.title: Virtual System Type
VirtualSystemType.description: VirtualSystemType shall reflect a particular type of virtual system.

Notes.title: Notes
Notes.description: End-user supplied notes that are related to the virtual system.
